none: Marriage Announcement for Dr. Mark Francis and Anna Scott, September 10, 1890
Marriage Announcement for Dr. Mark Francis and Anna Scott, September 10, 1890
Box 3 Louis L. McInnis Papers/Box 3 Folder 16 Louis L. McInnis Papers

en: A marriage announcement recording the wedding of Dr. Mark Francis and Anna J. Scott on September 10, 1890, in New London, Ohio. This document is part of the Louis L. McInnis Papers and represents a record of a significant social event from late 19th-century Ohio. The announcement provides documentation of a professional marriage during this historical period.

body.value:
Married,

Dr. Mark Francis

and

Anna J. Scott,

Wednesday, September tenth,

New London, Ohio.

1890.
